name: Emerald Falls
notes: Teal-green, breaks brown on texture; can run on vertical surfaces.

name: Seaweed
notes: Green variegation; known to be quite fluid; strong movement over texture.

name: Textured Turquoise
notes: Very fluid blue-green; will not stay put on steep walls.

name: Snow
notes: Pale semi-opaque white; good to lighten or soften color below.

name: Vert Lustre
notes: Deep green; can break darker; medium flow.

name: Deep Olive Speckle
notes: Olive-green with specks; relatively stable (lower flow).

name: Sour Apple
notes: Brush-on underglaze; stays put; usually needs a clear overglaze for gloss.
